notification.copyWarn: Warn: The copied content is empty!

setting.metadataKeywordDesc: The key name that reads the abbreviation information from the {placeholder}.
setting.markInSourceModeDesc: In Source mode, mark abbreviations just like in Live Preview and Reading view.
setting.detectCJK: Enable abbreviation detection for languages not separated by spaces
setting.detectCJKDesc: Detect abbreviations in languages that do not use spaces for word segmentation, such as {placeholder}.
setting.globalAbbreviationsDesc: Configure global abbreviations, but their priority is lower than {placeholder}.
setting.useMarkdownExtraSyntaxDesc: Toggle this setting to enable or disable the feature. Definition format: {placeholder}.
setting.useExtraDefinitionDecoratorDesc: Display a decorator at the end of the extra definition that this is an abbreviation definition.
setting.extraDefinitionDecoratorOpacityDesc: Opacity of the extra definition decorator. The value is the form of percentage.
setting.extraDefinitionDecoratorContentDesc: Content of the extra definition decorator. Two variables can be used: ${abbr} and ${tooltip}. To introduce certain information of the current definition into the content.
setting.affixesDesc: The list content uses comma-separated string, for example: {placeholder}.
